files.description: Defines the pipeline package and exposes the main entrypoint used by the project to run experiments end-to-end.
Implements the pipeline entrypoint that runs the toy experiment with deterministic seeding and writes canonical artifacts under outputs/.
Provides reusable helpers for canonical artifact creation (outputs dir, results.json, figure.png, run_stamp.json, run.log) and atomic writes.
Implements deterministic seeding across Python, NumPy, and (optionally) torch while recording the chosen seed for reproducibility.
Contains the toy experiment logic (fixed syntax, deterministic behavior) producing metrics and an optional plot saved as figure.png.
Provides a CLI module so the pipeline entrypoint can be invoked via python -m src with configurable seed and output directory.
Runs CI on push/pull_request to execute the pipeline, verify canonical artifacts are created, and fail fast on reproducibility regressions.
Shell wrapper to run the pipeline deterministically in local/dev and CI environments while standardizing output location to outputs/.

missionDescription: Repair the syntax error, add deterministic seeding, and ensure the toy experiment writes canonical artifacts (e.g., results.json, figure.png if applicable, plus run_stamp.json/run.log) under ./outputs/; then wire it into the pipeline entrypoint.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Fixing the syntax_error in src/goal_33_toy_experiment.py removes a known execution blocker flagged by audit, enabling deterministic runs that generate artifacts required for the first completed delive...
